name: yungoos

abilities.name: stakeout
abilities.description: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.

abilities.name: strong-jaw
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

description:
With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything.
It did not originally live in Alola but was
imported from another region.
